about_the_game: Traverse through the Orboltix® facility as Electrex Bolt® and initiate his post-mission training. Battle drones and bots as you strive to make it to the training hall. The events of this demo are set during the prologue mobile game, Hypcampex® GO, to prevent spoilers of the main story.
detailed_description: Traverse through the Orboltix® facility as Electrex Bolt® and initiate his post-mission training. Battle drones and bots as you strive to make it to the training hall. The events of this demo are set during the prologue mobile game, Hypcampex® GO, to prevent spoilers of the main story.
legal_notice: Copyright © Biologists of Later Tomorrows (BOLT) LLC. All characters, logos, insignias, names, music, and content of this game are trademarks and copyrights of Biologists of Later Tomorrows (BOLT) LLC. Unauthorized use will result in legal action.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 and Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.1 ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2nd Generation Intel Core HD Graphics (2000/3000), 512MB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Clear cache for best performance. Utilize SSD for faster performance. This game contains flashes and visual effects that could trigger seizures. Please consult with your doctor before playing if you are prone to seizures or epilepsy. STEAM DECK: To play on Steam Deck, select the game > settings > properties > compatibility > force use + Proton 9.0. Next, select the Deck right menu > Performance > Use per-game profile > Disable Frame Limit

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 12 or newer
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Clear cache for best performance. Utilize SSD for faster performance. This game contains flashes and visual effects that could trigger seizures. Please consult with your doctor before playing if you are prone to seizures or epilepsy. STEAM DECK: To play on Steam Deck, select the game > settings > properties > compatibility > force use + Proton 9.0. Next, select the Deck right menu > Performance > Use per-game profile > Disable Frame Limit

name: Hypcampex® Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7 6700 or Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 12 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB or Radeon RX 580 8GB or Arc A380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Clear cache for best performance. Utilize SSD for faster performance. This game contains flashes and visual effects that could trigger seizures. Please consult with your doctor before playing if you are prone to seizures or epilepsy. STEAM DECK: To play on Steam Deck, select the game > settings > properties > compatibility > force use + Proton 9.0. Next, select the Deck right menu > Performance > Use per-game profile > Disable Frame Limit

short_description: Set during the events of the prologue, Hypcampex® GO, join Electrex Bolt® as he traverses to the Orboltix® facility with Voltai® to initiate his post-mission training. Will Electrex Bolt® be able to face what awaits him in the facility?
